replies.body:
Every, single, game.

I can just imagine one day, when people click the little exclamation mark and it says 
_"Yasuo has been disabled due to a bug."_

Then mothers come into their kid's room and see their kids curled up in the fetal position in their underwear rocking back and forth, sweating with bloodshot eyes and gnawing on their limbs.

League of Legends loses half its player base in a single day.

meanwhile the rest of us are like 

http://static5.businessinsider.com/image/4fd6600769bedd1229000001/this-celebration-by-a-little-ukrainian-fan-at-euro-2012-is-perfect.jpg http://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-oIb8bZVtBSk/VfLMMCK7urI/AAAAAAAAp6c/Za9z17kzg_U/leonardo-dicaprio-celebrate-gif_thum.gif?imgmax=800 http://heatherclayton.weebly.com/uploads/4/8/9/9/48990401/5465489_orig.jpg

^

Almost certainly when/if that day ever comes, I will cancel any uni/work/life i have and play non stop for as long as i am physically able, savouring every glorious moment!

This is all Talon12 sees every game.

Has anyone given him his meds yet?
accurate representation of me afking in one for all
